title: Sampler, 1846
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: buttonhole, running and knotted stitches on plain weave
dimensions: Frame H x W: 19.4 x 20 cm (7 5/8 x 7 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Small sampler with decorative buttonholes worked in white on a white ground, with the inscription and date in red at center.
